content: He'll be back to his fire attacks here but they'll be much more amped up, so you'll want to knock as much of his health down in the first two rounds as you can.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Chapter_5_Secret-Bishui_Cave_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 5 Secret - Bishui Cave Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai King - Bishui Golden-Eyed Beast'.
The content is as follows:
He'll be back to his fire attacks here but they'll be much more amped up, so you'll want to knock as much of his health down in the first two rounds as you can.
